metadata.title: CVE-2016-7948 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 16.04 LTS (xenial) - low
metadata.description:
X.org libXrandr before 1.5.1 allows remote X servers to triggerout-of-bounds write operations by leveraging mishandling of reply data.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2016-7948` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libxrandr2 - 2:1.5.0-1ubuntu0.1~esm1
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: libxrandr package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2:1.5.0-1ubuntu0.1~esm1').
